document_data.name: ''Glowing Blueleaf Staff''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''glowing blueleaf staff''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[druid]]ic [[staff]] found in the jungles of [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These staves were imbued with elemental magics that, when mixed with [[blueleaf]] tree sap, resulted in a wondrous glowing effect. the staves possessed a powerful ''+4'' enchantments and strengthened abilities of the wielder druid as well as the druid's allies.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Qawasha]]: a [[druid]] of the [[Emerald Enclave]] from [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
